item.title: Install Google Fonts
item.description: The advice on whether to install these fonts is a bit outdated as many of the fonts are going “variable weight” which does not play nice with xetex and thus pandoc.

item.title: installing lineage
item.description: Install ADB https://wiki.lineageos.org/adb_fastboot_guide or sudo apt install adb Install udev rules Instructions taken from here:
